message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on the recognition and assessment of human actions in natural HRI scenarios, which involves the continuous acquisition of sensory information and real-time classification or assessment of human body patterns. This suggests that computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO) are likely sub-categories. The use of neural network self-organization for learning and recognition also suggests machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the focus on HRI domains suggests human-computer interaction (cs.HC) as a possible sub-category.
